items.content_html: Keeper App is a user-friendly, lightweight notes application built using React. It offers an elegant and straightforward way to organize, store, and manage your notes. Whether you're a student, professional, or just someone who loves to jot down ideas, Keeper App provides an easy-to-use interface that makes note-taking a breeze.
items.title: ameenalam98/Keeper-App: Keeper App is a user-friendly, lightweight notes application built using React. It offers an elegant and straightforward way to organize, store, and manage your notes. Whether you're a student, professional, or just someone who loves to jot down ideas, Keeper App provides an easy-to-use interface that makes note-taking a breeze.
